message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I understand its true worth to be $12,000. However, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a price of $11,000. This is an opportunity to acquire a product that is not only valuable but also tailored to meet your specific needs. I look forward to hearing your response and potentially discussing how this product can contribute to your success. Kind regards, Alice
